channel.title: The OSRemake Development team
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/r0733t.jpg[/img]
[b]POST ON THIS THREAD OTHERWISE DON'T ASK TO HELP/BETA TEST[/b]
Yes the beta is almost here! 5 more quests and [b]YOU[/b] will be pking.
[b]Support Us![/b] ;) [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/258xhqa.png[/img] [b]Or click this to support us[/b] [url=http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=OldSkoolRemake/](click here)[/url]
[B]Our 1st Part is Completing 100% FTP, then the server will be out for beta, as member play is added. (Member Play will be FREE)[/B]
[u] [b]Credits to the Creators![/b][/u]
We are currently working on a RuneScape remake.
This will be an original old skool type server which means the following.
---[b]NO[/b] custom items. ---[b]OLD[/b] original 377 cache, no delta bugged 377 cache. ---[b]NO 508 GAMEFRAME IN A 317[/b]
Now that that is out of the way we can talk about the server.
[b]THERE WILL BE NO COST FOR A MEMBERSHIP, as old runescape and a great server should be free to everyone![/b] Server base the base is Devolution 2.7 Cleaned by Ryan, as it is VERY stable and has basic features.
[b]Server Progression[/b]
----------- 100% is green 50% Orange is Progressing 0% Red is haven't started
100% Flawless pking 100% Specs 100% Pvp And NPC Combat
100% smithing 100% woodcutting 100% mining 95% cooking 100% runecrafting 90% crafting 100% agility 100% theiving/Pickpocketing 30% Herblore? 100% Magic 100% Projectiles 95% slayer 100% Fishing 100% Hill giant Dungeon 100% Bank Deposit 100% Firemaking Quests
[b]Completed Quests[/b] 100% [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/t80nxe.jpg[/img] [COLOR=Yellow]Cooks Assistant[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Demon Slayer[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Doric's Quest[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Goblin Diplomacy[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Imp Catcher[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Pirate's Treasure[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Prince Ali Rescue[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]The Restless Ghost[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Romeo & Juliet[/COLOR] [COLOR=Yellow]Sheep Shearer[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Shield of Arrav[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Vampire Slayer[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Witch's Potion[/COLOR]
[b]Town Progression[/b] (100% shops, npc spawn, and necessary doors)
[COLOR=green]Lumbridge[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Draynor[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Port Sarim[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Barbarian Village[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Varrock [/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Falador[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Al Kharid[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Draynor[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Port Sarim[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Rimmington[/COLOR]
Pictures
Login screen [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2mg3uok.jpg[/img]
Combat 100% (This is just projectiles Adding Real combat pictures soon) [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/n6ayp2.jpg[/img] Magic Combat 100% [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/fdv91l.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/hs89ed.jpg[/img] Newest Dungeon! 100% [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/6r7dht.jpg[/img] Varrock Dungeon 100% [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/dqisrd.jpg[/img]
Green Dragons in wilderness 100% [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2wqfr0m.jpg[/img]
Ice Giants Dungeon 100% [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2csfh9x.jpg[/img]
Deposit box 100% [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2dj6t6d.jpg[/img]
Firemaking 100% [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/4i0dbm.jpg[/img]
Fishing 100% [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/14jlxuc.jpg[/img]
Smithing Interface 100% (adding the picture where you make your armour tomrrow) [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/116t4df.jpg[/img]
Theiving/Pickpocketing 100% [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/244r80w.jpg[/img]
Woodcutting 100% (fixing the timers) [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/25gs9l5.jpg[/img]
Crafting Interface 100% (adding it where it shows you crafting) [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/20zoiki.jpg[/img]
Client Edits [b]None![/b] [b]THIS WILL BE DONE ON ORIGINAL DEOB LOADING CLEAN 377 CACHE[/b]
What happened to old skool servers? The ones with the old style gameframes, no custom items, real skills, real pking?
Well im hoping to create a server for all the people who prefer old skool runescape over the new one, by recreating old RuneScape to the fullest of our possiblity.

item.title: The OSRemake Development team
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

           [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/r0733t.jpg[/img]

POST ON THIS THREAD OTHERWISE DON’T ASK TO HELP/BETA TEST

Yes the beta is almost here! 5 more quests and YOU will be pking.

Support Us!

Or click this to support us (click here)

Our 1st Part is Completing 100% FTP, then the server will be out for beta, as member play is added.
(Member Play will be FREE)


Credits to the Creators!

We are currently working on a RuneScape remake.

This will be an original old skool type server which means the following.

—NO custom items.
—OLD original 377 cache, no delta bugged 377 cache.
—NO 508 GAMEFRAME IN A 317

Now that that is out of the way we can talk about the server.

THERE WILL BE NO COST FOR A MEMBERSHIP, as old runescape and a great server should be free to everyone!
Server base
the base is Devolution 2.7 Cleaned by Ryan, as it is VERY stable and has basic features.

Server Progression

100% is green
50% Orange is Progressing
0% Red is haven’t started

100% Flawless pking
100% Specs
100% Pvp And NPC Combat

100% smithing
100% woodcutting
100% mining
95% cooking
100% runecrafting
90% crafting
100% agility

30% Herblore?
100% Magic

95% slayer
100% Fishing
100% Hill giant Dungeon
100% Bank Deposit
100% Firemaking

Newest Dungeon! 100%

THIS WILL BE DONE ON ORIGINAL DEOB LOADING CLEAN 377 CACHE

What happened to old skool servers?
The ones with the old style gameframes, no custom items, real skills, real pking?

Well im hoping to create a server for all the people who prefer old skool runescape over the new one, by recreating old RuneScape to the fullest of our possiblity.
